Address: 2015 W. CHESTNUT STREET, ALHAMBRA, California, 91803, United States of America
CompanyDescription: EMCORE Corporation, together with its subsidiaries (referred to herein as the "Company," "we," "our," or "EMCORE"), was established in 1984 as a New Jersey corporation. The Company became publicly traded in 1997 and is listed on the Nasdaq Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol EMKR. EMCORE is a leading provider of sensors for navigation in the Aerospace and Defense market as well as a manufacturer of lasers and optical subsystems for use in the cable TV industry. EMCORE pioneered the linear fiber optic transmission technology that enabled the world's first delivery of Cable TV directly on fiber, and today is a leading provider of advanced Mixed-Signal Optics products serving the broadband communications and Aerospace and Defense markets.  ...
